mapper.insert: insert into tb_meta_quick_column_reason_${enterpriseId} ( quick_column_id, create_user_id, reason_name, mapping_result, deleted) values ( #{item.quickColumnId}, #{item.createUserId}, #{item.reasonName}, #{item.mappingResult}, 0)
mapper.update: update tb_meta_quick_column_reason_${enterpriseId} set deleted = 1 where id in #{id}
mapper.select: select id, quick_column_id as quickColumnId, reason_name AS reasonname, mapping_result as mappingResult from tb_meta_quick_column_reason_${enterpriseId} where quick_column_id in #{columnId} and deleted = 0
